name: backdrop_cycler
description: Automatically cycle through at least three backdrops, switching to the next backdrop every ~2 seconds in a loop
instruction: Starting from a Scratch project with a single default sprite named 'Sprite1' and 3 backdrops, you should complete the following: 1) When the green flag is clicked, make the stage automatically switch to the next backdrop every 2 seconds. 2) Ensure the backdrop switching loops forever.

evaluation.description: Checks that there are at least 3 backdrops and that the backdrop changes about every 2 seconds in a repeating cycle after the green flag is clicked
